mapper.insert: insert into qos_app_info ( name, code, state, disorder, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disorder, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update qos_app_info SET name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disorder = #{disorder, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from qos_app_info where code=#{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS qos.app_info ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, code varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '应用命名', name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '应用名称', disorder int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '排序', state tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '状态 0=停用 =1启用 =2删除', create_time datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1000 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
